trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle mouse-related events raised by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà gli eventi correlati al mouse generati da un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler delegate handles the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick> When you create a DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler gestisce le operazioni seguenti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>eventi:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick>quando si crea un delegato DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
